DOC.brief_title: Experimental Study Validate Modified Glucose Disposal Test
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis Type 2 diabetes Clinically healthy Drug naive stable dose metformin monotherapy and/or secretagogue Type 1 Diabetes History significant heart disease . Bariatric surgery Exposure fibrates , thiazolidinediones , insulin , exenatide , pramlintide DPPIV inhibitor
